trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Langhorne
There were no other sightings in Langhorne on or around September 2nd 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were having a Labor Day weekend barbecue at my parents house in Langhorne, Pa. After we all ate we decided to sit out back and just have some conversation. There were six of us there talking and discussing how low some of the planes were flying over heading to an airport in New Jersey. We spotted about four planes flying to the west of where we were sitting. They were flying west to east. Then we noticed to the east of where we were sitting there was a shiny silver cigar shaped object flying in the same direction that the planes were flying but not on the same path. It was further south but also heading east towards New Jersey. The thing that was so strange about it was how shiny it was, the sun was bouncing off this object and it didn't have any sound or lights flashing on it like the planes did. It was also flying slower than the planes.
Summary: Shiny silver cigar shaped object with no sound
